title: The Bite Size Podcast
description:
Bite Size is a psychoeducation podcast series for hospitality workers created with the goal to provide a fundamental foundation into understanding how our minds work. We’ll start with the basics, explaining exactly “what is mental health?” before exploring topics and situations that we find ourselves in while working in the hospitality industry. Each topic we discuss will come with a glossary of terms and thought prompts to help you dig deeper into learning not just about what mental health is, but their personal mental health journey. We believe that mental health education is paramount in successfully rebuilding the structures of the hospitality world.
_______________________________________________________________________________________

Bite Size es una serie de podcasts de psicoeducación para trabajadores de la hostelería creada con el objetivo de proporcionar una base fundamental para comprender cómo funciona nuestra mente.  Comenzaremos con lo básico, explicando exactamente "qué es la salud mental?"  antes de explorar temas y situaciones en las que nos encontramos mientras trabajamos en la industria hospitalidad. Cada tema que discutimos vendrá con un glosario de términos e indicaciones para pensar que lo ayudarán a profundizar en el aprendizaje no solo sobre lo que es la salud mental, sino también sobre su viaje personal de salud mental.  Creemos que la educación en salud mental es fundamental para reconstruir con éxito las estructuras del mundo de la hospitalidad.

title: Digital Gastronomy Talks
description:
Digital Gastronomy Talks, nace con la vocación de difundir contenidos relacionados con nuevos desarrollos tecnológicos orientados al sector HORECA. 

Desde LABe Digital Gastronomy Lab, identificamos constantemente soluciones tecnológicas que emergen y se adaptan en respuesta a los problemas inmediatos que pueden tener gestores y operarios en el sector. Sin embargo, pueden haber muchas opciones y poco tiempo para poder analizar sus funcionalidades y potenciales ventajas con calma. Digital Gastronomy Talks, es un espacio para dar visibilidad a los proveedores de nuevas soluciones tecnológicas y al mismo tiempo, conectar con una audiencia interesada que pueda generar un debate en torno a las mismas. 

Para ello en cada sesión se busca invitar a uno o más expertos en diferentes materias para contar sus experiencias bajo una temática en concreto. Se trata de webinars de una duración promedio de una hora, en la cual se alternan ponentes, se realizan preguntas a los invitados, así como las que pueda tener la audiencia a través del chat.

title: Distilled California
description:
Distilled California began as a joke. A historian and a distiller walk into a tasting room. What do they do? The historian says to the other. Do you know the story of the liquor that's in that glass? "No," says the distiller, do you know how it got into the glass in the first place? Do you know what it takes? "No," says the historian. And the rest is well...

Distilled California is the distiller-driven podcast for the booze nerd. Join hosts Dylan Almendral and Ryan Freisen as we take a deep dive into the bottle. We discuss the history, legends, politics and future of the California distilling industry from the ground up and distill what it means to be grain to glass in California. Ryan is a distiller and Vice President of the California Artisanal Distillers Guild. Dylan is a historian and writer. Both are devout students and stewards of the glass. This show exists to create informed drinkers. If you drink, know what's in your bottle! And, of course, to document the California distillery world while it is in its infancy. 
This podcast is for everyone; the aficionado, the vaguely interested, the distiller, the historian and the nerd alike. All are welcome and always will be. We all float down here. 

The podcast will feature tastings, science, history, interviews with distillers, book reviews, distributors, and of course, good times. 

Join us as we learn and pass on the experience to you! 

Please LIKE, COMMENT, SHARE AND SUBSCRIBE

title: WTF Am I Drinking?
description:
This is a podcast + blog series born out of conversations about how literally every single one of us who enjoy craft beer, hard seltzer, cider, wine spritzers, canned cocktails, hard teas, hard kombuchas--you name it--is operating at a different level of knowledge. Some of us are connoisseurs, some of us are newbies. Some of us want to reach expert status, some of us really don’t care how the sausage, or seltzer, is made as long as it tastes good--but so we do want to know how and why a particular seltzer does indeed taste good.

WTF Am I Drinking? is an explainer series that will dive into different topics like what a certain beer or wine style is, how a hard kombucha gets made, what the difference is between a stout and a porter--things like that. It’s educational and informational but in the most fun way possible--consider it the perfect thing to do while you sip your favorite beverage. You’ll learn a thing or two, and no doubt develop a deeper appreciation for drink X, Y, or Z. Basically, we all get to geek out a little, and dish on the beverages we love.

title: What R You Drinking? The pod on alcohol.
description:
Welcome to What R You Drinking? The pod on alcohol (WRYD) the ultimate podcast for all alcohol enthusiasts. Join our charismatic host, Raquel Richards, as she takes you on a journey through the world of spirits, cocktails, beer, mocktails, and more.

Raquel evaluates a wide range of alcohol products, providing detailed insights and honest opinions that will help you make informed choices for your next libation.

The fun doesn't stop there. WRYD goes beyond the glass to bring you the latest Boozy News and fascinating stories behind your favourite brands.

Who better to guide you through this intoxicating world than Raquel Richards? With an impressive 23-year career in the Canadian alcohol industry, Raquel brings a wealth of expertise to the table. She honed her skills at the LCBO for 10 years (Liquor Control Board of Ontario), where she served as the Spirits Ambassador, Beer Ambassador, and VQA Expert.

She also worked at The Wine Shop (Peller Estates Winery), and was a senior copywriter on the agency side for French and Italian wines. Her passion for alcohol reviews led her to create a popular column called "Sinful Sips" in a music magazine she owned. Additionally, Raquel holds certifications as a bartender from The Bartending School of Ontario and is Smart Serve certified.

If you’re not a connoisseur, but an enthusiast eager for fresh inspiration, "What R You Drinking?" is your gateway to a world of bevvies.

Join Raquel Richards and get ready to sip, savour, and discover!

title: EKKERT RUSL
description: Ruslið okkar kemur upp um okkur segja sérfræðingarnir. EKKERT RUSL er að vonum skemmtilegt og lifandi hlaðvarp um umhverfismál í umsjón Lenu Magnúsdóttur, sem hefur verið umhverfissinni frá fæðingu og Margréti Stefánsdóttur, sem er ekki beint umhverfissinni en er öll af vilja gerð að læra. Við fáum til okkar skemmtilega og jafnvel óvenjulega gesti í samhengi við umhverfismál sem og viðmælendur sem þekkja hvað best til málanna.  Umhverfisvernd er heita kartaflan í dag – flestir hafa eitthvað til málanna að leggja, eða vilja það að minnsta kosti. Það er ekki nóg að kaupa Teslu og telja sig umhverfisverndarsinna - það þarf víst aðeins meira til. Kannski slæðast nokkrir fræðslumolar með inn á milli í þessu hlaðvarpi til þess að hjálpa venjulegum íslenskum heimilum að bæta sig í umhverfisvernd. Við sitjum víst öll í sömu súpunni og þurfum að hysja upp um okkur. Við getum þetta saman.

title: What I Love About Bell with Hillary Cole
description: Hillary Cole, Director of Sales at Bell Wine Cellars, discusses her passion for wine in general and specifically what sets Bell Wine Cellars apart. Hillary started out as a military linguist and counter-terrorism analyst in the Washington, DC area, during which time she also had the opportunity to visit vineyards in Italy fairly regularly. The serenity and romance of the vineyards were a stark contrast to her Intelligence career and she felt at home every time she stepped foot on one. After leaving the Intelligence field, she moved to Sacramento to learn how to fly fixed-wing aircraft. She intended to be here for two years and then to fly airlifts in Africa, but gravitated instead to the wine industry via restaurant management as the General Manager and Sommelier for three Sacramento-area restaurant groups after finishing her MBA studies and Intro Sommelier exam. Her final position on the restaurant side of wine was running the wine program at Ella Dining Room and Bar in Sacramento. Hillary has completed several wine certification programs, her favorites among which include French Wine Scholar, Champagne Master Level, Napa Valley Wine Expert, and The Business of Wine. She has loved having the opportunity to maximize her backgrounds in business, wine, and leadership via her position as Director of Sales Manager at Bell Wine Cellars.

title: Passing Through A Vegan Door
description:
Hi! My name’s Harry, and welcome to Passing Through A Vegan Door Podcast. 

Veganism is a growing idea that leaving animals alone can save the world. It can be quite scary to take those first steps and change life long habits, but it’s important to find a way to break those habits and understand that what we do to animals every day isn’t right. 

Passing Through A Vegan Door is a way for me to talk about the things I care about while offering an insight into the who's, the what's, the when's, the where's, the why's, and the how's of being vegan. This podcast is for everyone: whether you’ve got decades more experience than me in being vegan; or you just wish vegans would shut up and let you eat your steak in peace. I’m not the expert… I’m just here to pass on the word. Hopefully it can be somewhat entertaining as I do. 

I will cover a range of topics such as: the environment, society, health, politics, diet, the animals themselves, and more! I will be chatting to people who share a similar mindset, and a common goal of living a vegan lifestyle, but also people who couldn’t care less. Those are the people who have the power to make real change. Small changes do make a big difference, and I hope to show you how.

“To be vegan, is to release your grip on the animal”

Thank you for reading, I hope whatever I can offer can be of help. Follow my instagram page @passingthroughavegandoor to keep up to date 🌱

description:
After 15 years of working in some of the best restaurants in the world, Phil & Eric have a lot of stories to tell and things to set straight!

title: Inside the Distillery at Cultivated Cocktails
description:
Listen in as we chat about our history, becoming a craft distillery, and sip on a few excellent spirits. This is the Cultivated Cocktails story as we know it so far. Documenting where we have been and the pieces that make us who we are today, as well as what comes our way as we go along. Join us on our journey.

As true natives of the Asheville NC area, the Howard family have raised generations in WNC. In 2012, they decided to start what was to become Asheville's first proper distillery to distill gin and rum since prohibition. With careful planning, research & development, and a burning desire to see Asheville become not just a beer mecca, but a craft beverage mecca, a distillery that would beckon curious drinkers far and wide was born.
A vision to bring a craft spirit with class to the table would soon become reality.
Over the years the vision has expanded to share the Cultivated Lifestyle. A new way to enjoy the distillery experience was created. From grain to garnish, Cultivated Cocktails takes you from the distillation process through the cocktail creation.

title: Let’s Talk Flavor With Chef T
description:

Chef T has a passion for creating southern fusion meals that elevate comfort foods to newer heights with his culinary techniques mixed with old school methods . 

Follow along in the journey as they embark opening Flavor By Chef T in Lampasas, Texas .

title: Mid-South Menu
description:
Hello, and welcome to Mid-South Menu. I’m your host Georgia Coles, and as a Memphian, I think our region’s food culture is so rich yet so underrated. Memphis truly reflects a commitment to an artisanal view of the food and drink crafted here. I have interviewed industry professionals and experts in their craft to get their perspectives on everything from gourmet coffee to fire stone beer to barbecue competition culture. I hope to share this with you. Memphis’s culinary offerings are unique and unparallelled, offering a wide variety of artisanal products. Join me on a tour unpacking the art and science of the 901’s food and drink culture, Memphis’s best, the Mid-South Menu.

My goal with this podcast is for each episode to answer engaging questions you may have always had about the craft and creation of high-quality food and drink. Thus, at the beginning of each episode I’ll name a few questions you can trust will be answered by the end.

title: "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe
description:
Are you ready to learn something new about the spirits industry? Then you won't want to miss our bourbon-inspired audio podcast, "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe! Hosted by the dynamic duo of Joe Vitale and Joe Gumeny, from the video podcast of Suburban Bourbon, this 30-minute show is a deep dive into the world of spirits, answering your most burning questions from the experts we interview. From restaurateurs to owners of taverns and leaders in the spirit industry, we're bringing you the insights and knowledge you've been craving.

Unlike our video podcast, Suburban Bourbon, this audio-only experience allows you to take in the knowledge while on-the-go or when you want to give your eyes a break from the screen. Whether you're a seasoned industry pro or a curious beginner, "Did You Know?" with Joe & Joe is the perfect blend of entertainment and education. Whether you've always wondered how your favorite restaurant got its start or you're interested in the latest trends in the spirits world, our audio podcast is the perfect way to get the scoop straight from the experts.

So sit back and get ready to hear the answers to the questions you've always wanted to ask. From behind-the-scenes stories to industry secrets and everything in between, our podcast is your all-access pass to the world of hospitality and spirits. Join us as we explore this exciting and ever-evolving industry together!

title: Deliciously Lit
description: Deliciously Lit is the perfect podcast for foodies, bookworms, and adventurers alike! Join us as we explore stories from all over the world that bring together books, food, drinks and more. Learn about how cultures intersect with flavors, discover new recipes and ingredients to try at home, and be inspired by unique conversations between experts in the culinary field. Our podcast opens up a whole new way to appreciate literature and travel right from your living room. Come join us on our journey of discovery - it's sure to be Deliciously Lit!

“EAT WELL, DRESS BETTER.”

¡Te presentamos “Gastro Shakers”, el nuevo Podcast de BCH!

A través de una serie de diálogos con los principales players que están revolucionando el panorama gastronómico y alimentario actual, abordaremos temas como la innovación alimentaria, la evolución de la figura del chef, cómo es de impactante la comunicación gastronómica hoy en día o la gestión de éxito en proyectos tanto empresariales como de restauración que han escalado a lo más alto

We talk with farmer and expert voices on their subject specialties: sharing practical advice, wisdom, and how to incorporate good food safety practices into your own growing operation.

title: Jorge Guglietta
description:
¿Alguna vez has soñado con emprender tu propio negocio gastronómico o mejorar la gestión de tu establecimiento actual?

El podcast que te llevará de la mano en el fascinante mundo de la gerencia gastronómica. Soy Jorge Guglietta, y después de más de 30 años de experiencia en el apasionante universo de la gastronomía y los alimentos y bebidas, estoy aquí para compartir contigo todo mi conocimiento y consejos prácticos acompañado de expertos en el área.

Este es el lugar perfecto para ti., exploraremos juntos las estrategias, las tendencias y los secretos detrás del éxito en la industria de la gastronomía.

Te llevaré a un viaje lleno de sabores, innovación y oportunidades. Descubrirás valiosos consejos gastronómicos, desde la creación de menús irresistibles hasta la gestión eficiente y la optimización de tus operaciones.

title: Último Relevo
description:
¡Bienvenido a tu podcast Último Relevo! Descubre la esencia y las historias detrás del maravilloso mundo del queso artesano. En cada episodio, nos sumergiremos en entrevistas apasionantes con los máximos expertos en queso, quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y experiencias únicas. Desde maestros queseros hasta afinadores y productores apasionados, exploraremos las técnicas ancestrales y modernas de elaboración, y desvelaremos cómo el queso se entrelaza con la cultura y la gastronomía. ¿Te apuntas?

Déjate cautivar por las historias que se esconden detrás de estos manjares lácteos. Permítenos compartir contigo la magia y el encanto del queso artesano, mientras te sumerges en una experiencia que deleitará tu paladar y enriquecerá tu conocimiento. ¡Prepárate para disfrutar de la pasión y el sabor del queso en cada episodio!

title: Motherhood
description:
Motherhood is a beautiful and complex journey that has been celebrated and explored throughout the ages. It is a journey that is unique to each woman who embarks on it, yet it is also a shared experience that connects mothers across the world. Being a mother is a role that comes with great responsibility, sacrifice, and love. The moment a woman becomes a mother, her life changes forever. She is no longer just responsible for herself, but also for the life of her child. The bond between a mother

and her child is one of the strongest and most enduring relationships in the world. It is a connection that begins before birth and lasts a lifetime. A mother is the first person a child looks to for comfort, safety, and guidance. Motherhood is a journey that is filled with many challenges. From sleepless nights to the terrible twos, raising a child can be a rollercoaster of emotions. Mothers often have to juggle multiple roles, including being a caregiver, teacher, nurse, and friend. They have

to be patient, understanding, and compassionate, even when they are exhausted and frustrated. Despite the challenges, motherhood is also a journey that is filled with joy and love. The first smile, the first word, and the first steps are all milestones that fill a mother's heart with pride and happiness. Mothers have the opportunity to watch their children grow and develop into unique individuals with their own personalities and dreams. Motherhood is also a journey that is marked by sacrifice.

Mothers often put their own needs and desires aside to prioritize the needs of their children. They give up their time, energy, and resources to ensure that their children have everything they need to thrive. This selflessness is a testament to the depth of a mother's love. In conclusion, motherhood is a journey that is both beautiful and complex. It is a journey that is unique to each woman who embarks on it, yet it is also a shared experience that connects mothers across the world. Being a mother

is a role that comes with great responsibility, sacrifice, and love. It is a journey that is filled with challenges, but also with joy and love.

title: Foodie Fusion: Uniting Flavors From East To West
description:
Welcome to our HOLY LAND’S HEAVENLY HOLIDAYS PRESERVING CULTURE THROUGH DESSERTS cookbook. Do you ever wonder why certain recipes have been passed down in cultures and families for generations? Or why something as wonderful as a delicious dessert, can bring a sense of comfort, discovery, and bonding? Food provides sustenance for our bodies, but it's so much more than that.

Having lived in the Holy Land, I wanted to create this unique cookbook for the 2 million Christians whom, each year, perform pilgrimages to Bethlehem, Nazareth, and Jerusalem. There, they can celebrate the importance and joy of perpetuating and discovering the historical cultural rituals and traditions of cooking, baking, and eating. The recipes are not only delicious, but they also serve as a way to connect with one’s Christian heritage and preserve a piece of our important history.

Through baking desserts and also learning about the spices, fruits, vegetables which are of major authenticity, we can learn about our ancestors, their traditions, and the stories behind the meals they enjoyed. Upon returning home from a journey to the Holy Land, pilgrims can also create new memories with loved ones by gathering in the kitchen and working together to create something special.

Throughout human history, food has the power to bring people closer together, to create a sense of community and belonging. Sharing a new dessert you've never tried baking before, is an experience that will be cherished.

So, come explore the cultural significance of desserts in the Holy Land, especially those enjoyed during the Easter and Christmas celebrations. Baking and eating the scrumptious goodies will bring joy, connection, and meaning to connecting with one’s Christian hertiage.

To purchase a copy of each episode’s recipe, stories, and photos, or, to purchase the entire book, Contact : Joeygalata@gmail.com

description:

How does something start from a crop, or animal, on a farm, and turn into a product that's readily available for consumption? How are the planet and its people impacted along the way?

Our hope is that by informing consumerism during each episode, our listeners can make decisions that are more in alignment with their environmental and social values.

title: Test
description: One morning, when Gregor Samsa woke from troubled dreams, he found himself transformed in his bed into a horrible vermin. He lay on his armour-like back, and if he lifted his head a little he could see his brown belly, slightly domed and divided by arches into stiff sections. The bedding was hardly able to cover it and seemed ready to slide off any moment. His many legs, pitifully thin compared with the size of the rest of him, waved about helplessly as he looked. "What's happened to me?" he thought. It wasn't a dream. His room, a proper human room although a little too small, lay peacefully between its four familiar walls. A collection of textile samples lay spread out on the table - Samsa was a travelling salesman - and above it there hung a picture that he had recently cut out of an illustrated magazine and housed in a nice, gilded frame. It showed a lady fitted out with a fur hat and fur boa who sat upright, raising a heavy fur muff that covered the whole of her lower arm towards the viewer. title: The Heart of Rural America
description:
Welcome to the Heart of Rural America podcast. I’m your host, Amanda Radke ​-- a South Dakota cattle rancher, wife, mom of four, children’s book author, and motivational speaker.

I started this show with a simple goal in mind -- to share the untold stories of the often-overlooked independent farmer and rancher. On this program, We’ll discuss the challenges that face rural America and the anti-animal agriculture agenda that seeks to eliminate our way of life. But in the face of these ongoing battles, we’ll explore impactful solutions and meaningful pathways to profitability in order to keep producers on the land, to safeguard our private property rights, and to keep meat, dairy, and eggs on the dinner table.

And in stark contrast to the ugly, divisive headlines in today’s mainstream media, "The Heart of Rural America" will celebrate the faith, family values, patriotism, and work ethic of the incredible people I meet in my travels as an agricultural speaker. I hope you’ll be inspired by these agricultural entrepreneurs and rural families, just as I am.

Now let’s hit the dusty trail together as we uncover The Heart of Rural America. - Amanda

title: WHY TIM HORTONS IS POPULAR
description:
in addition, the business has started fundraising campaigns to help organizations that aid in disaster relief, food banks, and children's hospitals. This has promoted a feeling of goodwill among clients and helped the business establish a positive reputation.

https://timhortons-menu-canada.info/

Tim Hortons Coffee Menu

Tim Hortons Breakfast Menu

Tim Hortons Lunch Menu

Tim Hortons Toronto Menu

Tim Hortons Breakfast Hours

Lastly, a major factor in Tim Hortons' success has been its branding and marketing initiatives. Canadians have grown accustomed to the chain's distinctive red and white logo and catchy jingles, and its Roll Up the Rim to Win promotion has grown to be a much-anticipated yearly event. The corporation has been able to solidify its reputation as a cherished Canadian institution because of the frequent inclusion of Canadian themes and cultural allusions in its marketing efforts.

ABOUT WHY TIM HORTONS IS POPULAR?

Tim Hortons is a well-known Canadian fast-food restaurant chain that primarily serves coffee and doughnuts, along with a variety of other food and beverage items. Here are some key points about Tim Hortons in Canada:

Founding and History: Tim Hortons was founded in 1964 by Tim Horton, a former NHL hockey player, and Jim Charade. The first store opened in Hamilton, Ontario. The chain quickly grew in popularity and expanded across Canada.

Iconic Products: Tim Hortons is famous for its coffee and doughnuts, especially its "Timbits" – bite-sized doughnut holes. Other popular items include breakfast sandwiches, bagels, muffins, and soups.

Double-Double: One of the most well-known aspects of Tim Hortons is its coffee customization options. "Double-double" refers to a coffee with two creams and two sugars, but customers can order their coffee to specific preferences.

Canadian Cultural Icon: Tim Hortons holds a special place in Canadian culture and is often considered a symbol of Canadian identity. It's a common meeting place for friends and family, and the brand is often associated with hockey and community gatherings.

Expansion and International Presence: While Tim Hortons has a strong presence in Canada, it has also expanded internationally, including locations in the United States, the Middle East, Europe, and Asia. However, its identity as a Canadian icon has sometimes been a subject of debate, especially as the chain expanded beyond Canada.

Ownership Changes: In 2014, Tim Hortons merged with Burger King to form the Restaurant Brands International (RBI) company. RBI is a Canadian multinational fast-food company that manages both the Tim Hortons and Burger King brands.

Controversies and Challenges: Over the years, Tim Hortons has faced various controversies, including disputes with franchisees over issues like pricing, product quality, and revenue-sharing. These disputes have occasionally sparked public attention and debate.
